name: LoveYouLanguages
0:
”Alexa, ask love you languages i love you”
”say i love you”
”how do i say i love you”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love you languages
des:
This skill tells you what the phrase "I love you" is in different languages. It is very easy to use, you just tell the skill I love you and it will read back the translation in a different language and tell you what language it chose. 

It is worth noting that Alexa pronounces things in American so the pronunciation will be a bit off which is a funny and cute quirk.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
